Class BoardOfWords

  • java.lang.Object
    • crossword.logic.BoardOfWords

    Author:
    Vanamo Piirainen

      • letterPositionsForLargeBoard

        public void letterPositionsForLargeBoard()
        There are several words per one row / column.

      • drawWord

        public void drawWord(String word,
                     WordPosition p)
        Draws the given word on the board. Alignment: 0 = horizontal 1 = vertical.
        Parameters:
        word - word to be drawn
        p - position to which to draw the word

      • drawFirstWord

        public void drawFirstWord(String word)
        Draws the starting word on the board. It is always drawn on the upper left corner of the board.
        Parameters:
        word - first word on the board

      • getLetter

        public char getLetter(int x,
                      int y)
        Parameters:
        x - horizontal index on the board
        y - vertical position on the board
        Returns:
        character on the board at the given position

      • setLetter

        public void setLetter(int x,
                      int y,
                      char c)
        Parameters:
        x - horizontal index on the board
        y - vertical position on the board
        c - character to be set on the board
